trans-unit.source: Describes a file download that has recently completed.
trans-unit.target: 描述最近完成的檔案下載。

trans-unit.source: The following code example downloads a file group named `HelpFiles`, and displays download progress in a status bar.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例下載的檔案群組名為`HelpFiles`，並顯示下載中狀態列的進度。

trans-unit.source: This example requires that you deploy a Windows Forms application, and that your main form has a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip> control, and a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripStatusLabel> control named `downloadStatus`.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例需要您部署的 Windows Form 應用程式，而且您的主要表單具有<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip>控制項和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripStatusLabel>控制項，名為`downloadStatus`。

trans-unit.source: Gets the name of the file group being downloaded.
trans-unit.target: 取得正在下載的檔案群組名稱。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.String" /> representing the name of the file group.
You can initiate multiple calls to <xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.DownloadFileGroupAsync%2A> and download multiple file groups simultaneously.
trans-unit.target: 您可以起始多次呼叫<xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.DownloadFileGroupAsync%2A>並同時下載多個檔案群組。

trans-unit.source: Use <xref:System.Deployment.Application.DownloadFileGroupCompletedEventArgs.Group%2A> to determine which event callbacks correspond to which group.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Deployment.Application.DownloadFileGroupCompletedEventArgs.Group%2A>回呼對應至這些群組來判斷哪些事件。

trans-unit.source: The following code example downloads a file group named `HelpFiles`, and displays download progress in a status bar.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例下載的檔案群組名為`HelpFiles`，並顯示下載中狀態列的進度。

trans-unit.source: This example requires that you deploy a Windows Forms application, and that your main form has a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip> control, and a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripStatusLabel> control named `downloadStatus`.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例需要您部署的 Windows Form 應用程式，而且您的主要表單具有<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip>控制項和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripStatusLabel>控制項，名為`downloadStatus`。
